article_text:
FRANKFURT—European car makers are beginning to boost output in their European factories as the European Union posted its first full year of growth in new car sales after six years of decline, according to official data released Friday.

News that car makers are increasing production demonstrates confidence on the part of manufacturers that demand for new cars will remain strong this year despite signs that the broader European economy...
